trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Pico Rivera
There was one other sighting in Pico Rivera on or around December 15th 2008
Summary: The UFO was following an airplane then disappeared out of sight.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at a party when I saw a flash of light from an airplane, I looked up and saw a circle darker than the night without clouds.Later on that night I felt a hand on my leg.I woke up and saw two short human-like entities. They're eyes were huge and almond shaped, they had big heads and four fingers on each hand.I was so scared.I had a sudden feeling to say "Don't go." Two years later I was sleeping when I heard a noise like a bird picking at my window.I looked up and saw another human-like entity.I was so scared I couldn't move. Several days later my friend and I were playing later than usual and when is was dark there was giant ring of light hovering over my house. My friends dad was fixing a truck. he had a flashlight facing upward so we though it was the flashlight. We turned it off and the ring was still on.
